summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4147 for the improvement of Dawson Street, from 42nd Avenue South to Bowen Place Produced; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 49607, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
